items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Allow users to share their fitness activities and progress with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow user to control who can see their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Privacy settings must comply with data protection regulations

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made include that the social features will be integrated into the same app as the fitness tracking functionality.
